alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Valley, northwestern Buffalo and Sherman Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 454 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of North Loup to near Loup City to 6 miles north of Amherst. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Loup City, Pleasanton, North Loup and Sherman Reservoir Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
